CustomField.formula: IF(OR(AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 3, DAY(Birthdate) > 20),AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 4, DAY(Birthdate) < 20)), "Aries", IF(OR(AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 4, DAY(Birthdate) > 19),AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 5, DAY(Birthdate) < 21)), "Taurus", IF(OR(AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 5, DAY(Birthdate) > 20),AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 6, DAY(Birthdate) < 21)), "Gemini", IF(OR(AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 6, DAY(Birthdate) > 20),AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 7, DAY(Birthdate) < 23)), "Cancer", IF(OR(AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 7, DAY(Birthdate) > 22),AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 8, DAY(Birthdate) < 23)), "Leo", IF(OR(AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 8, DAY(Birthdate) > 22),AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 9, DAY(Birthdate) < 23)), "Virgo", IF(OR(AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 9, DAY(Birthdate) > 22),AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 10, DAY(Birthdate) < 23)), "Libra", IF(OR(AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 10, DAY(Birthdate) > 22),AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 11, DAY(Birthdate) < 21)), "Scorpio", IF(OR(AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 11, DAY(Birthdate) > 21),AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 12, DAY(Birthdate) < 22)), "Sagittarius", IF(OR(AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 12, DAY(Birthdate) > 21),AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 1, DAY(Birthdate) < 20)), "Capricon", IF(OR(AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 1, DAY(Birthdate) > 19),AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 2, DAY(Birthdate) < 19)), "Aquarius", IF(OR(AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 2, DAY(Birthdate) > 18),AND(MONTH(Birthdate) = 3, DAY(Birthdate) < 21)), "Pisces",NULL))))))))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: What is the Contact's Zodiac Sign based on the Contact's Date of Birth
CustomField.label: Zodiac Sign
